CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Lien_Type__c, 'Personal Property Judgment Lien (JL-1)'), DATE(YEAR( Date_Filed__c ) +5,MONTH(Date_Filed__c),DAY(Date_Filed__c)), IF(ISPICKVAL(Lien_Type__c, 'Certificate of Penalty Lien (Workers Comp)'),DATE(YEAR( Date_Filed__c ) +10,MONTH(Date_Filed__c),DAY(Date_Filed__c)), IF(ISPICKVAL(Lien_Type__c,'Certificate of Lien (98.2g)'),DATE(YEAR( Date_Filed__c ) +10,MONTH(Date_Filed__c),DAY(Date_Filed__c)), IF(ISPICKVAL(Lien_Type__c,'UCC Financing Statement (UCC-1)'),DATE(YEAR( Date_Filed__c ) +5,MONTH(Date_Filed__c),DAY(Date_Filed__c)), IF(ISPICKVAL(Lien_Type__c,'Abstract of Judgment (Real Property Lien)'),DATE(YEAR( Date_Filed__c ) +10,MONTH(Date_Filed__c),DAY(Date_Filed__c)), IF(ISPICKVAL(Lien_Type__c,'Mechanics Lien'),Date_Filed__c+90, NULL))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date Lien Expires: 10 years for real property, 5 years for personal-property/UCC, etc
CustomField.label: Date Expired
